name: GetObjectModel
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Get the model ID of an object (CreateObject).

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object to get the model of

return_values: The model ID of the object. -1 if object does not exist.
pawn_code:
new objectid = CreateObject(1234, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
new modelid = GetObjectModel(objectid);
related_fn: GetPlayerObjectModel: Get the model ID of a player-object.
